data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Celtic push upfield and Christopher Jullien gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Hamilton defence.
In the minute 3, Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
Celtic drive into the zone and Kristoffer Ajer is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 4, Hamilton have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Celtic in Glasgow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Hamilton's Andy Winter is on target but unsuccessful.
Hamilton takes a corner from the right.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Glasgow.
In the minute 11, David Moyo (Hamilton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Celtic at Celtic Park.
Ball safe as Hamilton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Celtic drives forward and James Forrest gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Celtic takes a corner from the left.
Christopher Jullien (Celtic) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Hamilton goal kick.
Throw-in for Hamilton at Celtic Park.
Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Hamilton.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Hamilton in their own half.
Free kick for Hamilton in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hamilton.
In the minute 17, Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Scott Martin (Hamilton) has received a first yellow card.
Hamilton to take a throw-in in Celtic territory.
In the minute 20, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Odsonne Edouard.
Greg Taylor with an assist there.
Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Hamilton.
Hamilton's Shaun Want attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Celtic at Celtic Park.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Hamilton.
Odsonne Edouard (Celtic) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Hamilton goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Celtic.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Hamilton have a goal kick.
Throw-in Celtic.
Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Celtic take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Jeremie Frimpong.
Great play from Greg Taylor to set up the goal.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Celtic at Celtic Park.
In Glasgow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Scott Martin puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 35, Ryan Christie of Celtic gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ross Callachan is booked for the away team.
Ryan Christie (Celtic) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Celtic takes a corner from the right.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Glasgow.
In the minute 40, Hamilton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ronan Hughes is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ronan Hughes (Hamilton) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Marios Ogboe.
In the minute 42, David Moyo's header is off-target for Hamilton.
Throw-in for Celtic close to the penalty box.
Celtic pushes forward through Mohamed Elyounoussi, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Christopher Jullien (Celtic) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Celtic drive upfield and Christopher Jullien gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hamilton defender.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Glasgow.
Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Hamilton.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Hamilton in their own half.
Goal kick for Celtic at Celtic Park.
Goal! Celtic extend their lead to 3-1 through Odsonne Edouard.
In the minute 49, James Forrest instrumental with a fine assist.
Ryan Christie of Celtic smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Odsonne Edouard puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-1.
In the minute 54, Celtic have a goal kick.
Marios Ogboe (Hamilton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Celtic goal kick.
In the minute 57, Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
Hamilton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
In the minute 58, James Forrest (Celtic) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ryan Christie (Celtic) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Celtic takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 59, Celtic's James Forrest is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Celtic.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Celtic drives forward and Jeremie Frimpong gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Ryan Christie (Celtic) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Hamilton in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hamilton.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Hamilton at Celtic Park.
Mohamed Elyounoussi of Celtic smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Celtic takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 70, Hamilton awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Mohamed Elyounoussi with Olivier Ntcham.
Hamilton make their third substitution with Charlie Trafford replacing Hakeem Odofin.
In the minute 71, Ciaran McKenna is replacing Ross Callachan for the away team.
Celtic have a dangerous throw-in.
Marios Ogboe (Hamilton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 74, Marios Ogboe's header is off-target for Hamilton.
Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Hamilton in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hamilton.
Hamilton are coming forward and David Moyo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, Celtic have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Celtic at Celtic Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
Celtic takes a corner from the right.
Callum McGregor (Celtic) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Celtic.
Celtic pushes forward through Christopher Jullien, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hamilton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick Celtic.
Hamilton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greg Taylor (Celtic) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Ryan Christie with Patryk Klimala.
Hatem Elhamed is on a sub for Jeremie Frimpong for Celtic.
Karamoko Dembele is on a sub for Odsonne Edouard for Celtic.
In the minute 87, Hamilton's David Moyo has run offside.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Celtic needs to be cautious. Hamilton have an attacking throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-1.
Goal! Patryk Klimala extends Celtic's lead to 5-1.
That's a fine assist from Christopher Jullien.
